text: Does HubSpot have any way I can get the complete page HTML body via API request for a particular page ID and can update the HTML as well? I want to add HubL via API for my page data??
Do you have an example of what you wanna achive?

Thanks. I am looking to add if conditions based on certain request params via HubL on the page body content and if the request params value doesn't matches I want to block the page content/show some other content else want to show as it is to the end users. Does this help?

Why you wanna do this via api

You can use `request.query_dict`

I don't want to do this by editing every page on UI as there are a lot of pages, so looking for API based approach to do this programmatically via API like to pass page id in request, get the entire data and add HubL if conditions dynamically.
Let me know if you got any solutions, I am also curious to know this approach
